Reviews.Title: Works well, if you understand french
Reviews.Author: Tex
Reviews.Content: These are gray imports.If you have a Vivotek system already, these are very inexpensive. I have 8 of them and they work great.Either use the setup utility, or refer to any other vivotek manual to translate the French text on the web interface. They are functionally identical to the Vivotek IP7137, so download the manual for the IP7137 from Vivotek . com web site to find out how to set them up.You simply cannot get a US Vivotek camera at this price.Wireless works fine.

Reviews.Title: Wireless feature does not work
Reviews.Author: HANS W
Reviews.Content: Camera Only works while connected to computer and not wireless.Installation instructions are inadequate. Some notes are in French.Need to be a computer network engineer to make it work. Maybe?
